articles.title: Tesla’s robotaxi plans for Nevada move forward with testing permit
articles.description: Tesla can now test its autonomous vehicle technology on public streets in Nevada, but it still has steps to take if it wants to offer paid rides like in Austin, Texas.

articles.title: Gmail makes it easier to track upcoming package deliveries
articles.description: Google also announced on that it's updating the Promotion category in Gmail to allow users to sort by "most relevant" promotion emails.

articles.title: Elon Musk’s Boring Company suspends work on Vegas airport tunnel after ‘crushing injury’
articles.description: A worker had to be rescued by the local fire department, but is reportedly stable. Dozens of Boring Company workers have been injured over the years in Vegas.

articles.title: Box CEO Aaron Levie on AI’s ‘era of context’
articles.description: Box released a new set of AI tools at its Boxworks conference on Thursday, filling out CEO Aaron Levie's vision for an AI-led transformation of the enterprise.

articles.title: Developers joke about “coding like cavemen” as AI service suffers major outage
SAP warns of high-severity vulnerabilities in multiple products
High-severity vulnerability in Passwordstate credential manager. Patch now.
FTC launches inquiry into AI chatbot companions from Meta, OpenAI, and others
articles.description: The federal consumer regulator seeks to learn about how AI companies evaluate the safety of their chatbots.

articles.title: Apple’s latest iPhone security feature just made life more difficult for spyware makers
articles.description: Apple launched a new security feature for iPhone 17 and iPhone Air designed to reduce the effect of memory corruption bugs, and in turn make spyware and zero-days more difficult to hack into iPhones.

articles.title: The music industry is broken. OpenWav’s new app aims to change that
articles.description: OpenWav is building a direct-to-fan platform for music artists which lets them keep more of the profits.

articles.title: Justice Department sues Uber for allegedly discriminating against people with disabilities
articles.description: It's the latest in a long line of criticism — and action — against the company's treatment of people with physical disabilities.

articles.title: VC leaders from 01 Advisors take the Builders Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 to share the scaling playbook
articles.description: Adam Bain, Dick Costolo, and David Fischer — the operators behind Twitter and Meta’s growth — reunite at Disrupt 2025.

articles.title: France says Apple notified victims of new spyware attacks
articles.description: The French government says Apple sent out threat notifications to customers alerting them to spyware attacks earlier in September.

articles.title: Google is shutting down Tables, its Airtable rival
articles.description: Google Tables, a work-tracking tool and competitor to the popular spreadsheet-database hybrid Airtable, is shutting down. The app will not be supported after December 16, 2025.

articles.title: Humanoids, AVs, and what’s next in AI hardware with Waabi and Apptronik at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
articles.description: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 is bringing together 10,000+ startup and VC leaders for three days of bold ideas, groundbreaking tech, and future-shaping conversations.

articles.title: HBO Max is going to get more expensive, Warner Bros. Discovery CEO says
articles.description: Zaslav also said that the streaming service's crackdown on passwords will be coming in the future.

articles.title: Kids in the UK are hacking their own schools for dares and notoriety
articles.description: Kids are making a mark in the U.K.'s cybersecurity arena, and not in the way their parents want them to.

articles.title: How Bill Gates’s fellowship program is adapting to global uncertainty
articles.description: As Breakthrough Energy Fellows welcomes a new cohort of 22 startups, it is also diversifying its portfolio to include more global founders.

articles.title: Apple’s new live translation feature for AirPods won’t be available in the EU at launch
articles.description: On its official page detailing the features available on iOS 26, the company said EU residents or those with EU Apple IDs won't be able to use live translation, which is powered by Apple Intelligence

articles.title: A California bill that would regulate AI companion chatbots is close to becoming law
articles.description: If SB 243 is enacted, California would become the first state to require operators to implement safety protocols for AI companions and hold companies legally accountable if their chatbots fail to meet

articles.title: Perplexity reportedly raised $200M at $20B valuation
articles.description: The AI-powered search startup's valuation jumped from $18 billion two months earlier.

articles.title: Thinking Machines Lab wants to make AI models more consistent
articles.description: In a blog post shared Wednesday, Mira Murati's startup offered a rare glimpse into some of work its doing to improve AI models.

articles.title: How to turn off autoplay on your social media feeds
articles.description: Here's how you can turn off autoplaying videos and GIFs on Facebook, Instagram, X, Twitter, and Threads.
